data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in A‘ana, Samoa and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of A‘ana, Samoa
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of A‘ana, Samoa.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in A‘ana, Samoa.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of A'ana, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of A‘ana, Samoa.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Leulumoega
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Leulumoega, A‘ana, Samoa.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of A'ana.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of A'ana, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of A‘ana, Samoa has a population of 20,200.

We estimate A'ana has 3,751 people who might know Jesus, 15,674 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 775 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of A'ana.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
